Up for sale is two SGC graded examples of T201's...prices are delivered:
 
Hickman/Hinchman SGC 40 - $35 (card is a little loose in the tomb...slides around a bit)

Donovan/Stroud SGC 30 - $32 (Wet Sheet Transfer on front bottom...easy to see in-hand)

PM or email: [url]cavelyon@aol.com[/url]

Thanks for looking!
